title: Meddler: "we don't know yet if ancient coin is weak, or if frost queen is overpowered"
body:
No
Just No

ancient coin is so bad that that no one except janna takes it because she can't make use of the other items
I saw rakan players taking frost queen now

Ancient coin quest sucks so hard
You need to understand one thing: **no support cares about +1 level on spells** except sona that needs lvl 16 fast

Ancient coin doesn't give +1 level, if you're lvl 10 you won't get the base stats of lvl 11
if you could, it would have been great on Braum who gets an insane base stats from level, same for alistar
**you also do not upgrade your passive abilities**
like rakan Q won't heal more depending on levels

+1 level on spells is so bad compared to frost queen bonus ms, and relic shield out of combat shield that makes supports tankier than toplaners

Make ancient coin quest giving a whole level instead of +1 skill stat

replies.body:
Janna X RubicK: "I make things up and then present them as quotes"

Let's start with a look at the post you're referring to:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/haWf2QnU-quick-gameplay-thoughts-june-13

Relevant section:

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=haWf2QnU,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-06-13T15:56:37.452+0000)

> 
> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> **Support Starting Items**
> 
> We&#039;ve been looking at the starting support items now that they&#039;ve been out for a while. Conclusion is that the Coin line is underperforming, so we&#039;ll be doing some more work on it. That will likely involve improvements both to the tier1 and tier 2 versions as well as the tier 3 upgrades (probably both Talisman and Eye of the Oasis). 
> 
> Possible the Frost Queen&#039;s is also too strong, what we&#039;ll likely do is buff coin first though then reassess whether that&#039;s actually the case or not.
> 
> -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Key things in there just to spell it out even more explicitly:

* We've identified Coin is weak and will be buffing it, probably at all three upgrade tiers.
* Frost Queen's might also be too strong. We'll look at that again after buffing Coin. Coin being weak doesn't mean Frost Queen's can't also be overpowered.

Calling this thread out in particular because I think it's sad to see this sort of attitude on Boards, especially in a somewhat upvoted thread. The feeling any words you write will be deliberately misinterpreted, or warped, is something I've heard a number of Rioters call out over the years as one of the reasons they don't want to post anymore.
